row.Docu: This include is used add arguments which are common for all actions.This along with action specific arguments are passed to the java command while calling the nexus jar. It can be used for both Windows and Unix environment

row.process:
: SET &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = ""
: SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&UC4RB_OPTIONS#[],SIZE) : SET &IDX# = 1
: WHILE &IDX# LE &LEN# ! Concatinate option and its value : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, &UC4RB_OPTIONS#[&IDX#]) : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " ") : SET &IDX# = &IDX# + 1 : ENDWHILE
